languages.text: Выступив против Империума, Вольный Торговец сплотил{mf||а} вокруг себя всех еретиков и врагов Кредо в Просторе. Никто не смел оспорить первенство хозя{mf|ина|йки} прирученного звездного чудовища, и под твердой {mf|его|ее} рукой создавалось новое воинство Губительных сил, спаянное ужасом и покорностью.

When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.
languages.original_text: Выступив против Империума, Вольный Торговец сплотил{mf||а} вокруг себя всех еретиков и врагов Кредо в Просторе. traits.locale_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the leadership of the {mf|master|mistress} of the tamed stellar beast. Under an iron rule of the Rogue Trader, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together with fear and obedience.

languages.text: 行商浪人背叛了帝国，将科罗努斯扩区内的异端分子与和信条之敌团结在自己身边。没人敢挑战这位奴役了星神碎片的人。在行商浪人的铁腕统治之下，全新的毁灭之力军团正在不断集结，恐惧与顺服将所有人牢牢凝聚在了一起。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人背叛了帝国，将科罗努斯扩区内的异端分子与和信条之敌团结在自己身边。没人敢挑战这位奴役了星神碎片的人。在行商浪人的铁腕统治之下，全新的毁灭之力军团正在不断集结，恐惧与顺服将所有人牢牢凝聚在了一起。

languages.text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gegen das Imperium rebellierte, scharte {mf|er|sie} Ketzer und Feinde des Glaubens aus der gesamten Ausdehnung um sich. Niemand wagte es, {mf|den Herren,|die Herrin} des versklavten Sternenmonsters herauszufordern. Unter der eisernen Herrschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} bildete sich eine neue Legion der Mächte der Zerstörung, zusammengeschweißt durch Angst und Gehorsam.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gegen das Imperium rebellierte, scharte {mf|er|sie} Ketzer und Feinde des Glaubens aus der gesamten Ausdehnung um sich. Niemand wagte es, {mf|den Herren,|die Herrin} des versklavten Sternenmonsters herauszufordern. Unter der eisernen Herrschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} bildete sich eine neue Legion der Mächte der Zerstörung, zusammengeschweißt durch Angst und Gehorsam.

languages.text: Lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se rebella contre l'Imperium, {mf|il|elle} rassembla à ses côtés les hérétiques et les ennemis du Crédo à travers les Étendues. Personne n'avait le courage de défier {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} de la bête stellaire asservie. Sous sa férule, une nouvelle légion de Puissances de la Ruine se forma, unie par la peur et l'obligation de soumission.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se rebella contre l'Imperium, {mf|il|elle} rassembla à ses côtés les hérétiques et les ennemis du Crédo à travers les Étendues. Personne n'avait le courage de défier {mf|le maître|la maîtresse} de la bête stellaire asservie. Sous sa férule, une nouvelle légion de Puissances de la Ruine se forma, unie par la peur et l'obligation de soumission.

languages.text: Cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se rebeló contra el Imperium, unió a los herejes y enemigos del Credo en la Extensión con un solo propósito. Nadie era tan osado como para desafiar al am{mf|o|a} de la bestia estelar esclavizada. Bajo el control férreo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se gestaba una nueva legión de los Poderes Ruinosos, unida por el miedo y la obediencia.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: Cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se rebeló contra el Imperium, unió a los herejes y enemigos del Credo en la Extensión con un solo propósito. Nadie era tan osado como para desafiar al am{mf|o|a} de la bestia estelar esclavizada. languages.text: 自由開拓者が帝国に反旗を翻すにあたり、{mf|彼|彼女}は異端者と信条の敵を、エクスパンス周辺に団結させた。隷属された恒星獣の主に挑む勇者はいなかった。自由開拓者の鉄の支配の下、恐怖と服従によって結ばれた禍つ神々の新たな軍団が形成されつつあった。
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が帝国に反旗を翻すにあたり、{mf|彼|彼女}は異端者と信条の敵を、エクスパンス周辺に団結させた。隷属された恒星獣の主に挑む勇者はいなかった。自由開拓者の鉄の支配の下、恐怖と服従によって結ばれた禍つ神々の新たな軍団が形成されつつあった。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, İmparatorluk'a isyan etti, kâfirleri ve Enginlik'teki İtikat düşmanlarını tek bayrak altında topladı. Köleleştirilmiş yıldız yaratığının efendisine kafa tutacak cesareti gösterecek kimse çıkmadı. Hür Tacir'in demir yumruğu, korku ve itaatin bir araya getirdiği yeni bir Yıkıcı Güçler lejyonu toplanıyordu.
languages.original_text: When the Rogue Trader rebelled against the Imperium, {mf|he|she} united heretics and enemies of the Creed in the Expanse around {mf|him|her}. No one was brave enough to challenge the {mf|master|mistress} of the enslaved stellar beast. Under the Rogue Trader's iron rule, a new legion of the Ruinous Powers was forming, welded together by fear and obedience.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, İmparatorluk'a karşı isyan başlattı, kâfirleri ve Enginlik'teki İtikat düşmanlarını tek bayrak altında topladı. Köleleştirilmiş yıldız yaratığının efendisine kafa tutacak kadar cesur kimse çıkmadı. Hür Tacir'in demir yumruğu sayesinde, Yıkıcı Güçler için korku ve itaatle kenetlenmiş yeni bir lejyon toplanıyordu.
